name: orthologr
tagline: A package combining common gene orthology detection methods and dN/dS models for pipeline processing
body:
### Welcome to the github project of orthologr.

There exists a vast diversity of published and implemented gene orthology detection methods and techniques.
This R package is an attempt to use the strength and reproducibility of the R package philosophy and aims to combine common open source software that has been developed for gene orthology detection to provide a orthology detection pipeline for the R framework.      

You can download the current version of the package as following in R:

```
library(devtools)
install_github('orthologr')

```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
